item.description:
I am closing RSVP's on this site, Saturday @ 2:30pm. Still room for one more on the Hartford Area NFL Football Meetup site (see below). Have a great weekend.

Just a note to let you know that I am hosting the NFL Meetup on Sunday Jan 20th. AFC/NFC Championship games: Patriots vs Chargers at 3:00, and Giants vs Cowboys at 6:30. I am cooking Chili with sour cream. Guests bring veggies, salsa and chips, dessert, beer or wine, or whatever you like.

RSVP HERE:
Hartford Area NFL Football Meetup SITE AT:
http://nflfootball.me...

I will email directions to my Manchester home on Saturday to all the "YES" RSVP's.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Football Dinner @ Betsy's house in Manchester on Jan 20th
